short_summary: To replace aging and failing domestic water copper piping
description: To replace aging and failing domestic water copper piping throughout the Atlantic Institution located in Renous, New Brunswick. In general, work under this contract consists of, but is not limited to the following: Replace existing domestic water copper piping NPS 3 and under with new PEX-A piping, Supply and install pipe insulation, jacketing, hangers, saddles, support, sleeves, fittings, firestopping systems and Re-use/re-install existing plumbing fixtures and accessories. The Contractor shall perform and complete the Work within 135 weeks from the date of notification of acceptance of the offer.
duration_in_months: It is estimated that the project will take 9 months.
full_summary:
# Invitation to Qualify - Domestic Plumbing Upgrades
## Title
INVITATION TO QUALIFY - **Domestic Plumbing Upgrades at Atlantic Institution, Renous, New Brunswick**

## Reference and Solicitation Details
* Reference Number: WS4318306345
* Solicitation Number: WS4318306345
* Amendment Number: 0
* Publication Date: November 21, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: December 7, 2023, 02:00 PM local time
* Amendment Date: November 21, 2023
* Expected Contract Start Date: January 12, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: None
* Tender Status: Expired

## Category and Procurement Method
* Category: Construction Services (CNST)
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding

## Trade Agreements
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Location and Services
* Location: Atlantic Institution, Renous, New Brunswick
* Services: Replacement of aging and failing domestic water copper piping, supply and installation of pipe insulation, jacketing, hangers, saddles, support, sleeves, fittings, firestopping systems, and re-use/re-install of existing plumbing fixtures and accessories.

## Tender Description
The contractor will be responsible for replacing existing domestic water copper piping with new PEX-A piping. This may include supply and installation of pipe insulation, jacketing, hangers, saddles, support, sleeves, fittings, firestopping systems, and the re-use/re-install of existing plumbing fixtures and accessories.

The work must be completed within 135 weeks from the date of notification of acceptance of the offer.

## Contact Information
* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contact Name: Johnston, Edward (SPAC/PSPC)
* Contact Email: edward.johnston@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Notice and Attachment
* URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18067128?extsite=MTgwNjcxMjhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
